I always think that the danger at the moment is that he is effectively being punished twice for the same offense. I think in life that sometimes it is right to give someone a second chance, he added. David Cameron chose Andy Coulson as communications director after Andy Coulson had resigned from the newspaper because of the phone hacking charges. Andy Coulson has denied any wrongdoing, but the case continues to dog him
